body:
Hi guys!

So, recently I decided to create Avipack which is going to be texture pack for all Avicus players. It's going to be 128x128. So, after the arrow is done, first version of Avipack will be released. What do you guys think about that?

Sincerely,
DeliciousShoesHD!

Sincerely,
DeliciousShoesHD!

replies.body: he/she is correct (sorry I don't know you, don't want to be gender inconsiderate xd) the only way to change the names of items is via the plugin, it cannot be done in a texture/resource pack. you can however change sounds of things and  looks of items. you could also add things to normal minecraft, like the main menu page you can have custom sayings - like the red sayings that appear random on the main screen, yea you can customize that :o - and you can also have custom sounds, which I know how to do as well :)
replies.body_tagged: he/she is correct (sorry I don't know you, don't want to be gender inconsiderate xd) the only way to change the names of items is via the plugin, it cannot be done in a texture/resource pack. you can however change sounds of things and  looks of items. you could also add things to normal minecraft, like the main menu page you can have custom sayings - like the red sayings that appear random on the main screen, yea you can customize that :o - and you can also have custom sounds, which I know how to do as well :)

replies.body: You can rename items (And more) in resource packs by editing the lang file,  and the sayings on the title screen are called splash text :p
